name: Sweet Sugar Ball Fruit Juice Splash
name_original: Sweet Sugar Ball Fruit Juice Splash
description:
Sweet Sugar Ball Fruit Juice Splash

Get ready for Sweet Sugar Ball Fruit Juice Splash time!! Start a fun-tastic puzzle solving quest, There're tons of surprises for you to discover. Come on into this amazingly tasty Sweet Sugar Ball Fruit Juice Splash world, and begin enjoying 200 levels of delicious challenges NOW!!!

:::Features:::

• 200 sweet levels to explore! (LV new update you soon.)
• Easy to learn and enjoyable match 3 game for the young & young at heart!
• A new flavor of matching puzzle game, challenging and delicious.
• Unique power-ups specially designed in each levels.
• Innovative new gameplay: clear a way to collect the target candies.

====== How to Play ======
• Match candies as many as you can to get higher score in group 3 or more.
• Collect a certain number of target candies to pass the level.
• Candy Smash is free to play.
